name: Lost and Impound
description:
A criminal is on the loose!

To track them down, pay attention to police reports, or choose to trust one of 2 dubious rumors, one of which is always true!

Once you have an idea of the culprit, click on them on the map and dispatch the police! Don't worry if you selected wrong, you'll just have to wait a brief time before they can be dispatched again. Good luck!

Created by a group of 3 for Global Game Jam 2021 with the theme of 'Lost and Found'
